# Core Government
Core Government, shortened to CoreGov or simply CG, is a government that governs the core worlds, specifically the 143 star systems near the center of charted space. They are relatively small territorial wise, however hold great power and technology. They have withstood the test of time, being the eldest faction founded in the year 2060. CoreGov has founded the economy of Credits and invented the universal identification network, alongside the PDA.
